Subject: A Writer's Life
Description: How do you handle the daily mechanics of hammering your magical, sparking, glittering craft into the finished product that could sell. What practical habits foster the creative process on a daily basis and how do you manage the emotional blender that is making words ready for publishing?   Speakers include:Tobias Buckell, Ferrett Steinmetz, Cathrynne Valente, Dave Klecha, Andrew Zimmerman Jones - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Acts of Shameless Self-Promotion
Description: What's the best way to get your name forward?  Speakers include:Dave Klecha, Michael W. Lucas, Jackie Morgan, Steven Saus - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Erotica in Speculative Fiction
Description: Birds do it, bees do it, and elves and aliens do it. Our panelists talk about erotica in science fiction and fantasy genre fiction.  Speakers include:Ken MacGregor, Jay Maynard, Nicole Castle, Dave Klecha - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
